trans-unit.source: Represents the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine.
In a system of project-to-project dependencies, the Engine maintains the building projects, making it possible to avoid building the same target in the same project more than once in a given build.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref> class.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> that represents properties to be passed to the child engine.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref> class.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetDefinitionLocations"></xref> enumeration that specifies the location of the Toolset definition.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref> class that has the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.BinPath*>.
The path to MSBuild.exe.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref> class.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> that represents properties to be passed to the child engine.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetDefinitionLocations"></xref> enumeration specifies the location of the Toolset definition.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref> class.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> that represents properties to be passed to the child engine.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetDefinitionLocations"></xref> enumeration specifies the location of the Toolset definition.
An integer that specifies the number of CPUs or cores in the system.
Gets or sets the path to MSBuild.exe.
In [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 3.5, the "BinPath" is superseded by the "ToolsPath."
Therefore, in the .Targets file, use MSBuildToolsPath rather than MBBuildBinPath.
In the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] object model, "BinPath" relates to the Toolset you are running.
The steps to get the path from the build engine are as follows: 1.
Get the default tools version.
Get the Toolset map.
Find the Toolset, based on the string in the map.
Get the Toolset.
Get the path from the Toolset.
This procedure is not required if you are creating the engine.
In that case, you already know the Toolset path.
Because projects in a solution can use different Toolsets, you can also obtain the MSBuild.exe path from the project, as follows.
``` project.EvaluatedProperties[ReservedPropertyNames.toolsPath].FinalValue ``` For more information about Toolsets, see `MSBuild Tool Set (ToolsVersion)`.
The path to MSBuild.exe.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the building of targets in the project is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the building of targets in the project is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Builds the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> to build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Builds the specified target of the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> to build.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attribute of the Target element to build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Builds the specified targets of the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> to build.
An array that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attributes of the Target elements to build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Builds the specified targets of the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref>, and returns the outputs of the targets.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> to build.
An array that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attributes of the Target elements to build.
The outputs of the built targets.
This parameter can be a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) if outputs are not required.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Builds the specified targets of the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> with the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildSettings"></xref>, and returns the outputs of the targets.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> to build.
An array that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attributes of the Target elements to build.
The outputs of the built targets.
This parameter can be a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) if outputs are not required.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildSettings"></xref> to apply to the build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Loads the specified project file and builds the project.
The project file to load and build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Loads the specified project file and builds the specified target of the project.
The project file to load and build.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attribute of the Target element to build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Loads the specified project file and builds the specified targets of the project.
The project file to load and build.
An array that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attributes of the Target elements to build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Loads the specified project file and builds the specified targets of the project with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.GlobalProperties*>, and returns the outputs of the targets.
The project file to load and build.
An array that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attributes of the Target elements to build.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.GlobalProperties*> to apply to the build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Loads the specified project file and builds the specified targets of the project with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.GlobalProperties*>, and returns the outputs of the targets.
The project file to load and build.
An array that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attributes of the Target elements to build.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.GlobalProperties*> to apply to the build.
The outputs of the built targets.
This parameter can be a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) if outputs are not required.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Loads the specified project file and builds the specified targets of the project with the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildSettings"></xref> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.GlobalProperties*>, and returns the outputs of the targets.
The project file to load and build.
An array that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attributes of the Target elements to build.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.GlobalProperties*> to apply to the build.
The outputs of the built targets.
This parameter can be a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) if outputs are not required.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildSettings"></xref> to apply to the build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Loads a project file from disk and builds the given targets.
This overload takes a set of global properties for each project to use for the build, returns the target outputs, and also enables the caller to specify additional build flags.
The name of the project to build.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> array of targets for each project.
Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if you want to build the default targets for the project.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> array of properties for each project.
Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no global properties are required.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildSettings"></xref> array of tables for target outputs.
Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if outputs are not required.
A string array of additional build flags.
The ToolsVersion to impose on the project in this build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Loads a set of project files from disk and then builds the given list of targets for each project.
This overload takes a set of global properties for each project to use for the build, returns the target outputs, and also enables the caller to specify additional build flags.
A string list of project files to build.
This value cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> array of targets for each project.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> array of properties for each project.
This value cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildSettings"></xref> array of tables for target outputs.
This value cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A string array of additional build flags.
The ToolsVersion to impose on the project in this build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the project built successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Creates an empty <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> object that is associated with this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref>.
The created <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> object.
The default ToolsVersion of this build engine.
Projects use this ToolsVersion if they are not otherwise told which ToolsVersion to use.
This value is retrieved from either the .exe.config file or the registry.
If neither specify a default ToolsVersion, then the version is hard-coded to version "2.0."
For more information about ToolsVersion, see [Building for Specific Versions of the .NET Framework](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8).
A string that represents the default ToolsVersion.
Returns the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> object that is associated with the specified project file.
The fully qualified file path to the project file of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> object.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> object that associated with the specified project file.

If no <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> object is associated with the specified project file, the method returns a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]).
Gets the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref> that is global (shared) for this <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref> that is global (shared) for this <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
Gets or sets a collection of the global properties for the project.

Global properties are properties that are set by using the **/property** switch on the command line, or properties that are set by the integrated development environment (IDE) before a project is built.
These global properties are applied to all projects that are built by using this <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine>.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> that contains the global properties for the project.
Gets whether a project is currently being built.
This property can be checked to prevent a project from being modified while it is being built.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a build is in progress; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to only log critical events, such as warnings and errors, during the build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if only critical events should be logged; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Registers distributed loggers with the build engine.
This method is not thread-safe.
To ensure uniform behavior, all loggers should register before the build is started.
For more information, see [Writing Multi-Processor-Aware Loggers](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
An <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger"></xref> that represents the central logger.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.LoggerDescription"></xref> that represents the forwarding logger.
Registers the specified logger with the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref>.
When a logger is registered with the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine>, it receives all build events.
To unregister loggers, use the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.UnregisterAllLoggers%2A> method.
The logger to associate with the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref>.
Called when the host is finished with this build engine.
It unregisters loggers and shuts down nodes.
Sets or Gets the collection of Toolsets that are recognized by this build engine instance.
For more information about ToolSets, see [Building for Specific Versions of the .NET Framework](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8).
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection"></xref> of the tools sets recognized by this engine instance.
Removes all references to <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> objects from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref>.
Removes the reference to the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref>.
Unregisters all loggers from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref>.

The UnregisterAllLoggers method calls the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger.Shutdown%2A> method on every registered logger before unregistering each of them from the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine>.
Gets the version of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref>.
The version of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref>.
